title: What can i do if i missed my medical debt collection court date in a different county where I live?
question: I was not served and paperwork was given to family at my last known address.
answers:
Get papers

Call other side to explain and get time

Or find lawyer

Or request Court for more time to respond to complaint


Or try to settle
